setting.name: uri
setting.description: The AOR for this line. This attribute is also the index attribute for this object class.

setting.name: name
setting.description: A short descriptive name for this line. Used primarily for display purposes. For example

setting.name: extension
setting.label: Extension
setting.description: The numerical extension, which is used within the PBX domain as an alias to address this line. This would either be for the purpose of transferring a call to or retrieving a call from.

setting.name: trunk-mode
setting.label: Trunk mode
setting.description: If set, this line will operate as a trunk, allowing multiple simultaneous sessions. Otherwise, only a single session at a time will be allowed.

setting.name: publish-line-presence
setting.label: Publish line presence
setting.description: If set, line presence information will be made available for this line.

setting.name: acd-queue
setting.description: The ACD Queue that this line is assigned to. Calls arriving on this line will be handled by the ACD Queue specified here. Â The ACD Queue is identified via its acd-queue identifier.
